attributes.action: Bring in a charge for cyclists, especially those on Mountain Bike, for the damage to the landscape
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As cyclists, in particular those on Mountain Bike cause major damage to the land, and they appear not to care about this. In order for the National Trust & other custodians of the land to repair the damage by these people. A nationwide cycling charge needs to be levied, one similar to the proposed congestion charge for motor vehicles.
